title: {LFM} - [Discord] - Playerpool Solo-/Duo-/FlexQ & Team ranked

embed.description: Step up your game with a modern voice & text chat app. Crystal clear voice, multiple server and channel support, mobile apps, and more. Get your free server now!

body:
**Welcome to Solo-/Duo-/FlexQ Playerpool by eRox.Teexas! EUW**
I'm really happy that so many people join my discord Server in the last time!
Enjoy the time here and feel free to post in Solo-/Duo-/FlexQ, friends or other players

Join my Discord Server for aktiv FlexQ groups & better communication:
Link: https://discord.gg/hm2Hhd3

------------------------------------------------

**Meeting, 30.04.2017**
Time: *Afternoon & Evening!*
--------------------------------

**Table of content:**
1. Team ranked - Squad -> *Apply*
2. Wanted -> *MOD's*
3. Future! -> *Privat tournements*

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1.0
**General**
-> Fixed FlexQ groups with time schedule
-> 2-3 Substitute player for each squad
-> Rank: Squad "Name" + privat chat room
-> Squad manger, Coaching + Game analyse

1.1
**Ranked Team - Squad**
Ingamename:
SoloQ Rank:
FlexQ Rank:
Main role:
Secound role:
Time to play:

1.2
**Apply (5)Ranked Team - Squad**
*Ingamename:* eRoxTX
*SoloQ Rank:* G5
*FlexQ Rank:* G5
*Main role:* MID (Annie)
*Secound role:* TOP (Kayle)
*Time to play "Team ranked FlexQ":* -> **I want a Squad to play after eveningschool (22.00-00.0) 2-3 rounds **
-> **Mo:** 08.00-17.15 (Working/Learning/Playing DuoQ) - 17.15-21.30 (School) - **22.00-00.00 (Team ranked FlexQ)**
-> **Tu:** 08.00-17.15 (Working/Learning/Playing DuoQ) - 17.15-21.30 (School) - **22.00-00.00 (Team ranked FlexQ)**
-> **We:** 08.00-17.15 (Working/Learning/Playing DuoQ) - 17.15-21.30 (School) - **22.00-00.00 (Team ranked FlexQ)**
-> **Th:** 08.00-17.15 (Working/Learning/Playing DuoQ) - 17.15-21.30 (School) - **22.00-00.00 (Team ranked FlexQ)**
-> **Fr:**08.00-17.15 (Working/Learning/Playing DuoQ) - Evening (Depends!)
-> **Sa:** Whole day (Depends!)
-> **So:** Whole day (Depends!)  - **Evening 18.00-00.00 (Team ranked FlexQ)**

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

2.0
**Wanted**
I'm searching staff for our discord server.
- Moderator: General discord things (Ranks, Chat/Voice Channels, Music, ... Bots)
- Squad manger: Organize teams (Schedule, Hire players, random stuff)
- Writer: English/German texts for forum etc.
- Coaches: TOP, JNG, MID, ADC, SUP (Diamond/Plat)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

3.0
**Future**
- More people for Community
- Privat/offical tournements
- Open for ideas

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Don't hesitate to ask questions in general chat or Voice Channel: RND 
Please ./W me privat  for WANTED (Staff) questions etc.

& thanks again! I reached my vacation goal to learn offrole top lane kayle and pushed FlexQ to Gold

I'm open for ideas!
Thanks & Greetz
eRoxTX
{{champion:10}}
